title: Coronavirus India live updates: Delhi sees lowest single-day Covid case tally of 2021 at 59
description: India reported 46,148 new Covid-19 cases and 979 deaths in the last 24 hours, according to data released by the union health and family welfare ministry on Monday. This is for the first time in over two and half months that the death toll has come below the 1,000-mark and the 11th consecutive day in the last two months when the toll has been below the 2,000-mark. The total caseload rose to 3,02,79,331 as India crossed the mark of over three crore Covid cases last Wednesday.

title: Fuel prices hit fresh record high; Petrol nears Rs 100/litre in Chennai
description: Petrol and diesel prices: The price of petrol in Delhi currently stands at Rs 98.81 per litre while diesel is now selling at Rs 89.18. In Mumbai, petrol costs Rs 104.90, while diesel is retailing at Rs 96.72. In Chennai, petrol neared the Rs 100-mark and currently stands at Rs 99.80. Read below to find out fuel prices in your city.

description: Addressing a press conference on Thursday, the Congress working president of the Madhya Pradesh unit, Jitu Patwari said, “A new report shows that over two lakh (200,000) people have lost their lives to Covid-19 in the state.
